Name: Hachiman
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Hachiman’s Bow and Staff of Hachiman.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.
Once per round when an enemy Formation declares a charge against a friendly Formation you roll a D6. On a 4+ that charge automatically fails irrespective of the charge roll

Spells.Name: Blessing of Hachiman (35)
Spells.Effect: Weapons equipped by friendly Formations within 6” of this model gain Ethereal Weapon (D3) if they do not already have the Ethereal Weapon rule.
